entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 12:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: NW 15 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Flurries beginning late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
